name: aetherlock-protocol
description: AI-driven, trustless, and agentic escrow & verification protocol

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../solana-program && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:contracts && npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup:env: cp .env.example .env && cp frontend/.env.example frontend/.env && cp backend/.env.example backend/.env
scripts.demo:reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build:all
scripts.security:audit: npm audit && cd frontend && npm audit && cd ../backend && npm audit

author: AetherLock Protocol Team
